As you lift the collar up to [npc.namePos] neck, you see that the ring attached to the front starts to glow green; a clear indication that it's detecting [npc.herHim] as a potential enslavement target. Encouraged by the light, you finish what you started, and with a heavy metal 'clink', you clasp the collar around [npc.namePos] neck.

As the collar's arcane enchantment recognises its new wearer as being a criminal, ominous purple lettering starts to glow around the metal band, which reads:

[style.italicsArcane(Slave Registered.
Identification: [npc.nameFull(true)]
Race: [npc.Race])]

#IF(npc.isMute()) Finally realising what's going on, [npc.name] looks up at you with fear in [npc.her] [npc.eyes] and lets out an almost inaudible whine. #ELSE Finally realising what's going on, [npc.name] looks up at you with fear in [npc.her] [npc.eyes] and exclaims in shock, [npc.speech(Wait, [npc.pcName]! This isn't a slave collar is it?!)] #ENDIF

Grinning at [npc.name], you don't have time to offer a response, as with a bright purple flash, [npc.she] suddenly disappears from sight. The last thing you see as [npc.sheIs] whisked away is a face of shocked betrayal, and you can only imagine how angry [npc.she]'ll be when you see [npc.herHim] next.

#ELSE

Holding the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] in one [pc.hand], you take a step towards the [npc.race]. [npc.She] lets out a distressed cry as [npc.she] sees what you're about to do, but [npc.sheIs] so exhausted that [npc.she] can't manage to put up any significant amount of resistance.

Ignoring [npc.her] warning, you force the item of clothing onto the [npc.race], before stepping back and waiting to see if anything happens. True to [npc.her] words, however, the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment recognises [npc.herHim] as already being a slave, which is evidenced by glowing green lettering that's projected into the air, reading:

[style.boldGreen(Slave already registered!)]

[style.italicsBad(Target not wanted for enslavement!)]

Despite the fact that [npc.sheIs] a wanted criminal, the [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0]'s arcane enchantment recognises the fact that you don't have a slaver license, which is evidenced by glowing red lettering that's projected into the air, reading:

[style.italicsBad(Invalid owner! Slaver license required!
Please contact the nearest Enforcer and inform them that this target is a wanted criminal!)]

The [npc.race] lets out a relieved sigh as [npc.she] sees that [npc.sheHas] avoided being enslaved. Not wanting to waste your time trying to hunt down an Enforcer who could deal with this [npc.race], you make a disappointed tutting noise as you step back and wonder what to do next...

Deciding that it's time to set [npc.name] free, you write [npc.her] name on your Freedom Certification and give it your signature, before holding it up to your now-ex slave and letting [npc.herHim] see what it is that you've just done. Not quite believing what it is [npc.sheIs] seeing, [npc.she] reaches up to take the piece of paper from your [pc.hands] and carefully reads over it several times. With a suspicious glare in [npc.her] [npc.eyes+], [npc.she] finally asks, [npc.speech(This isn't a trick, is it? I'm... I'm actually free?)]

As soon as you've confirmed that [npc.sheIs] now a free [npc.race], [npc.namePos] old attitude makes a sudden return, and she storms pasts you and flings opens the door. No longer afraid to express her true feelings, [npc.she] turns back and angrily snarls, [npc.speech(Fuck you for keeping me as a slave, [pc.name]! I'm going to be far better off back at Helena's nest!)]

With that, [npc.name] sprints off down the corridor, and as you hear the distant sound of the front door slamming shut behind [npc.herHim], you realise that if you want to see [npc.herHim] again, you're going to have to head back to the Harpy Nests...

Before [npc.she] leaves, you realise that you have this one chance to prevent [npc.herHim] from leaving your life forever. By offering [npc.herHim] the use of one of the mansion's guest rooms, you could potentially build a real relationship with [npc.name]. Then again, if you simply wanted [npc.herHim] to leave, you could just say goodbye...

Not interested in having [npc.name] stay on as a guest in the mansion, you say goodbye to [npc.herHim]. Turning back in the doorway and giving you a slight smile, [npc.she] says, [npc.speech(I guess you weren't the worst owner to have, [pc.name]. I hope you treat your other slaves well...)]

With that, [npc.name] sets off down the corridor, and as you hear the distant sound of the front door closing shut behind [npc.herHim], you realise that you're never going to see [npc.herHim] again...

Definitely not interested in having [npc.name] stay on as a guest in the mansion, you decide to speed [npc.her] departure along by [pc.stepping] over to the room's bell pull and tugging on it. Within seconds, Rose appears at the door, and you tell the cat-girl maid that [npc.name] is trespassing and needs to be thrown out. Immediately grabbing your ex-slave by the [npc.arm], Rose gives [npc.herHim] no time in which to say anything more to you and forcefully pulls [npc.herHim] out of the room.

Soon afterwards, you hear the distant sound of the front door closing shut behind [npc.name], you realise that you're never going to have to see [npc.herHim] again...

Moving forwards, you stop [npc.name] from leaving by telling [npc.herHim] that you're not kicking [npc.herHim] out, and that if [npc.she]'d like, [npc.she] can continue to live here in the mansion as your guest.

[npc.NamePos] [npc.eyes+] light up as you say this, and with more than a hint of excitement in [npc.her] voice, [npc.she] asks, [npc.speech(Really? You mean... I can continue to live here with you?)]

After you've confirmed that that's what you mean, [npc.name] exclaims, [npc.speech(Thank you, [pc.name]! You've always treated me well, even though I was just a slave...)]

Smiling at your ex-slave, you ask [npc.herHim] to accompany you to [npc.her] new room. Happily tagging along, [npc.name] [npc.walks] by your side as you lead [npc.herHim] to the guest room which [npc.she]'ll be staying in from now on. Turning to face you with tears of happiness in [npc.her] [npc.eyes+], [npc.name] exclaims, [npc.speech(Thank you, [pc.name]! I just... I can't thank you enough; I was so scared of being kicked back out into the streets! Thank you!)]

Telling [npc.name] that [npc.she]'ll be safe here as your guest, you head over to the door of [npc.her] new room. Telling [npc.herHim] to take some time in which to get settled, you make your exit and wonder what to do next...
